main event: Witnesses reported sightings of unidentified flying objects in Hastings, Michigan in September 1956.
interesting points: One round object was reported to grow from the size of a small ball to the size of a baseball before vanishing after 15 minutes,Another witness described a triangular metallic object passing over at about 10,000 feet altitude,The triangular object was observed for 3-5 minutes,The round object was observed at the same location and time the day before,The objects were classified as not being aircraft, satellites, or meteors.
sighted object: one round object and one triangular object
witness description: Witnesses reported observations of different objects, one round and one triangular.
